edge: after Neteyam's funeral, Jake informs Tonowari of his decision to leave the Metkayina.
After Neteyam's funeral, Jake informs Tonowari of his decision to leave the Metkayina. However, Tonowari identifies Jake's family as being part of the clan out of reverence and welcomes them to stay.
Jake's family accept their new lives at sea but vow to continue their struggle against the RDA. Jake's family are still part of the Metkayina clan out of reverence and are welcomed by Tonowari.
Jake's family continue their struggle against the RDA.
